name: officeless-self-service-portal
description: Next.js self-service onboarding + admin portal for Officeless AWS deployments. Package selector, infra profile sizing under $1k/month, Terraform plan preview (mock), cost estimator, trial cap, admin offboarding.

scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w terraform-catalog && npm run build -w cost-estimator
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/web
